nodes.text: The Outer Rim was an alcoholic beverage served at Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu in 34 ABY. The cocktail was brown in color and served with ice and black salt on the glass's rim. The drink was suitable for human consumption and shared its name with the Outer Rim Territories. One night after the First Order killed Zade Kalliday's smuggling partner, Kalliday visited Oga's Cantina and drank the beverage before giving a speech to cantina's patrons, trying to agitate them to join the Resistance.

The Outer Rim is one of the alcoholic beverages sold to customers at the Oga's Cantina bar in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. It's composed of margarita with a black salt rim. The beverage was first revealed as part of a large promotional event held on February 26, 2019. The menu's description reads, "Patrón Silver tequila, Cedilla açaí liqueur, lime juice, pure cane sugar, with black salt and exotic fruit purée."
